name: Healthcare-Patient-Risk Analytical App for Business Users
description: The app enables healthcare providers to enhance patient care and operational efficiency by accurately forecasting patient risk levels.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Healthcare Patient Risk Prediction

Overview

This app helps healthcare providers assess patient risk by analyzing critical health metrics such as cholesterol levels, blood pressure, and blood sugar. It enables early identification of high-risk patients for timely intervention and better care outcomes.

Input

  • + Your patient health dataset
  • + A pre-trained classification model

Output

  • + Patient risk classification outcomes
  • + Comparison of actual vs predicted risk categories
  • + Insights from validation data to assess model accuracy
  • + Data-driven guidance for care prioritization and resource allocation

Benefits

  • + Enables early identification of high-risk patients for proactive intervention.
  • + Improves patient outcomes by facilitating timely and targeted care.
  • + Optimizes resource allocation in healthcare settings.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Data Description

Field Name Description
Cholesterol Level Analyzes the cholesterol levels in patients to help predict the risk of heart disease.
Systolic Blood Pressure Monitors the systolic blood pressure of patients to identify those with hypertension or cardiovascular risks.
Blood Sugar Level Tracks blood sugar levels to assess the risk of diabetes and its complications.
Diastolic Blood Pressure Examines diastolic blood pressure to provide a complete picture of cardiovascular health.
Age Considers the age of patients, as it is a significant factor in overall health and risk assessment.
Liver Enzyme Level Measures liver enzyme levels to detect liver-related issues and overall metabolic health.
BMI Calculates Body Mass Index (BMI) to identify potential obesity-related health risks.
Insulin Level Monitors insulin levels to assess the risk of diabetes and metabolic syndrome.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
